mapper.select: SELECT id, name, type, data, createdAt, updatedAt FROM file ORDER BY id
SELECT id, name, type, data, createdAt, updatedAt FROM file WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file ( name, type, data, createdAt, updatedAt ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{type}, #{data}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE file SET name= #{name}, type= #{type}, data= #{data}, updatedAt= #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
